title: (x) Williams Integracare Clinic - Garamond (ITC & Adobe) {Franz, Yves}
content:
Can you take a look at [http://www.icareclinics.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144803/http:/www.icareclinics.com/) and let me know what the font is where it says, "because urgent means now" and "welcome to williams/integracare"   
   
Thank You in advance
author: secondtoughest

comments.content:
Actually that's two different faces: the [because urgent means now](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/itc-garamond/narrow-book/testdrive.html?s=because%20urgent%20means%20now&p=48)  
line is indeed ITC Garamond Narrow Book, but the [welcome to](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-garamond/regular/testdrive.html?s=welcome%20to%20williams%2Fintegracare&p=36)  
 [williams/integracare](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-garamond/regular/testdrive.html?s=welcome%20to%20williams%2Fintegracare&p=36) line is set in Adobe Garamond. All other   
headers are [ITC Garamond Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-garamond/book/testdrive.html?s=one%20body%2C%20one%20solution&p=24).   
   
Sorry to have kept you waiting: I've been busy.
